audiobook.description:
Author(s): E. Lockhart Narrator(s): Kimberly Farr #1 NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLER • The addictive prequel to the TikTok phenomenon We Were Liars: the story of another summer, another generation—and the secrets that will haunt them for decades to come.
 
"I anticipated that at some point a shocking twist would come. And, wow, does it ever." —The New York Times
 
"A perfect beach read." —The Boston Globe
 
A windswept private island off the coast of Massachusetts. 
A hungry ocean, churning with secrets and sorrow.
A fiery, addicted heiress. An irresistible, unpredictable boy. 
A summer of unforgivable betrayal and terrible mistakes.
 
Welcome back to the Sinclair family. 
They were always liars.

And, wow, does it ever." —<i>The New York Times</i></b><br> <br><b>"A perfect beach read." —<i>The Boston Globe</i></b><br> <br>A windswept private island off the coast of Massachusetts. <br>A hungry ocean, churning with secrets and sorrow.<br>A fiery, addicted heiress. An irresistible, unpredictable boy. <br>A summer of unforgivable betrayal and terrible mistakes.<br> <br>Welcome back to the Sinclair family. <br>They were always liars.
audiobook.name: Family of Liars: The Prequel to We Were Liars
